artifacts.name: Adventurer
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Opening chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

artifacts.name: Archaic Petra
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

artifacts.name: Berserker
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

artifacts.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

artifacts.name: Brave Heart
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Increases DMG by 30% against enemies with more than 50% HP.

artifacts.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

artifacts.name: Defender's Will
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Increases Elemental RES by 30% for each element present in the party.

artifacts.name: Emblem of Severed Fate
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.

artifacts.name: Instructor
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

artifacts.name: Lavawalker
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Increases DMG against enemies that are Burning or affected by Pyro by 35%.

artifacts.name: Lucky Dog
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.

artifacts.name: Maiden Beloved
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

artifacts.name: Martial Artist
artifacts.2-piece_bonus: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

artifacts.name: Noblesse Oblige
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Using an Elemental Burst increase all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

artifacts.name: Pale Flame
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, the 2-set effect is increased by 100%.

artifacts.name: Resolution of Sojourner
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

artifacts.name: Retracing Bolide
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

artifacts.name: Scholar
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Gaining Energy gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occurs once every 3s.

artifacts.name: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s.

artifacts.name: Tenacity of the Millelith
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the ATK of all nearby party members is increased by 20% and their Shield Strength is increased by 30% for 3s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

artifacts.name: The Exile
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for other party members every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

artifacts.name: Thundering Fury
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

artifacts.name: Thundersoother
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Electro by 35%.

artifacts.name: Tiny Miracle
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

artifacts.name: Traveling Doctor
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.

artifacts.name: Viridescent Venerer
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

artifacts.name: Wanderer's Troupe
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.

artifacts.name: Blizzard Strayer
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: When a character attacks an enemy affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the enemy is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

artifacts.name: Heart of Depth
artifacts.4-piece_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.
